statements: SELECT * FROM building_codes WHERE building_code = 123;
SELECT location_name, building_code FROM building_codes WHERE building_code > 100;
SELECT location_name, regulatory_requirements FROM building_codes WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM building_codes WHERE regulatory_requirements LIKE '%fire%';
SELECT DISTINCT location_id, location_name FROM building_codes ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_codes WHERE building_code = 123;
SELECT location_name, building_code FROM building_codes WHERE regulatory_requirements = 'Fire Safety';
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM building_codes WHERE location_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_buildings FROM building_codes;
SELECT DISTINCT regulatory_requirements FROM building_codes WHERE building_code > 200 ORDER BY regulatory_requirements ASC;
SELECT building_code, regulatory_requirement FROM building_codes WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT building_code, regulatory_requirement FROM building_codes WHERE regulatory_requirement LIKE '%safety%';
SELECT location_name, city FROM locations WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM building_codes JOIN locations ON building_codes.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM building_codes WHERE regulatory_requirement = 'Fire Safety Regulations';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT building_code, regulatory_requirement FROM building_codes WHERE building_code LIKE 'B%';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE state = 'California' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM locations ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, building_codes FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Architects ORDER BY architect_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, architect_name, location_name FROM Projects JOIN Architects ON Projects.architect_id = Architects.architect_id JOIN Locations ON Projects.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT DISTINCT architect_license_number FROM Architects;
SELECT * FROM Locations;

SELECT project_id, project_name, Architects.architect_name, Locations.location_name FROM Projects JOIN Architects ON Projects.architect_id = Architects.architect_id JOIN Locations ON Projects.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT architect_name, architect_license_number FROM Architects WHERE architect_id = 1;

SELECT project_name, architect_name, location_name FROM Projects JOIN Architects ON Projects.architect_id = Architects.architect_id JOIN Locations ON Projects.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE project_id = 1;

SELECT architect_name, location_name, regulatory_requirements FROM Projects JOIN Architects ON Projects.architect_id = Architects.architect_id JOIN Locations ON Projects.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE architect_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM BuildingCodes;
SELECT code_description, code_category FROM BuildingCodes;
SELECT location_id, code_description, code_category FROM BuildingCodes WHERE building_code_id = 1;
SELECT Architects.name, Architects.experience_years, BuildingCodes.code_description FROM Architects INNER JOIN BuildingCodes ON Architects.architect_id = BuildingCodes.building_code_id;

SELECT Locations.city, Locations.state, BuildingCodes.code_description, RegulatoryRequirements.description FROM Locations LEFT JOIN BuildingCodes ON Locations.location_id = BuildingCodes.location_id LEFT JOIN RegulatoryRequirements ON BuildingCodes.building_code_id = RegulatoryRequirements.code_id;
SELECT * FROM BuildingCodes;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT code_description, code_category FROM BuildingCodes WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT Architects.name, Architects.experience_years, BuildingCodes.code_description FROM Architects JOIN BuildingCodes ON Architects.architect_id = BuildingCodes.location_id;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements ORDER BY description DESC;
SELECT * FROM architects;
SELECT architect_name, architect_email FROM architects ORDER BY architect_name DESC;
SELECT architect_name, architect_email FROM architects WHERE architect_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM building_codes JOIN locations ON building_codes.location_id = locations.location_id;

SELECT architect_name, regulation_description FROM architects JOIN architect_regulations ON architects.architect_id = architect_regulations.architect_id JOIN regulations ON architect_regulations.regulation_id = regulations.regulation_id ORDER BY architect_name;
SELECT * FROM architects WHERE architect_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY architect_name DESC;
SELECT architect_name, architect_email FROM architects WHERE architect_id = 1;
SELECT architects.architect_name, locations.location_name FROM architects INNER JOIN locations ON architects.architect_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM architect_regulations WHERE regulation_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND architect_id = 2 ORDER BY regulation_id ASC;

SELECT architect_name, COUNT(*) AS num_regulations FROM architects INNER JOIN architect_regulations ON architects.architect_id = architect_regulations.architect_id GROUP BY architect_name HAVING num_regulations > 2;
